long_description: The North Face Verto 26 pack comfortably hauls all your summit day essentials, yet whittles weight down to a bare minimum with light and tough materials. Triple-point compression system lets the Verto 26 double as a stuff sack for your sleeping bag. 2 zippered pockets and a water bottle pocket organize small accessories. The North Face Verto 26 pack features multiple reflective lash points and dual ice axe loops.
short_description: The North Face Verto 26 pack comfortably hauls all your summit day essentials, yet whittles weight down to a bare minimum with light and tough materials.
